resources.string:
Changelog:
 ·v0.0.1 First public release.
 ·v0.0.2 Improved stability, added Exit button.
 ·v0.0.3 Code updates.
 ·v0.0.4 Changed drawables, added sharing, added more info in export text.
 ·v0.0.4 UI Update, bumped APIs.
 ·v1.0.0 Redesign, added Android TV support.

Notes:
 ·While the application is running, the only "hard" keys which should work is "Home" and power. All others will produce their keycodes.
 ·The SU request is to read the kernel log, so the app can check if any key related messages are thrown by the kernel.
 ·The location of keylayout files in Android is "/system/usr/keylayout".
Press buttons to see the keycodes:\n
Unable to save the log to disk unless permission is granted!
